<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuAwesome|{{https://i.imgur.com/afT8KY3.jpg}}]]</nowiki> 

'''Ubuntu Awesome''' is an unofficial flavour of Ubuntu, featuring the <nowiki>[[http://awesome.naquadah.org/ | AWESOME]]</nowiki> Window Manager Environment. 

Ubuntu Awesome (formerly Ubuntu AWESOME Remix) is a mostly pure AWESOME desktop experience built from the Ubuntu repositories.

Please join us and contribute to an exciting, international, free and open source software project. We look forward to working together with you.
